description: This table stores the orders associated with a flowsheet row in a multiple-response format for easier reporting.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated order ID stored in a flowsheet row in this inpatient data record. Together with INPATIENT_DATA_ID, this forms the foreign key to the IP_FLOWSHEET_ROWS table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple order IDs stored in a flowsheet row that is associated with the inpatient data record and the order ID from the IP_FLOWSHEET_ROWS table.

columns.name: IX_FLOW_RW_ORD_ID
columns.description: The unique IDs of the orders that are added to this patient's flowsheet row. This is a multiple-response item.
